name: El Chapo
preparation:
You've never had a strawberry cocktail like this before.

Add all ingredients into an Old Fashioned glass over fresh ice.

Top with the beer.

Garnish with 2 speared fresh strawberry slices.

*Strawberry-infused Aperol: Soak 1/2 pint fresh strawberries in 1 750 mL bottle of Aperol for at least 8 hours or overnight, then strain out solids.
